#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,p,count,i;
        cin>>n>>p;
        count=0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            int x;
            cin>>x;
            if(x>=p)
                count++;
        }
        cout<<count<<endl;
    }
}
